attributes.action: Return to the British tradition whereby Ministers resign over issues of maladministration, misleading Parliament, abuse of privileges, gross incompetence etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would improve the tarnished
reputation of Government Officials both to the UK electorate and overseas. Improving people’s confidence in the integrity of our Politicians will increase the turnout in elections, currently at an all time low, and enhance democracy.

rejection.details: This isn't really a call-to-action for the Prime Minister
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
